articles.author: Hans von der Burchard, James Angelos
articles.title: Far-right surge upends German state elections - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Elections in Bavaria and Hesse underscored frustration with the federal ruling coalition, as Alternative for Germany made big gains.
articles.content: In two German state elections that are seen as a bellwether of the national mood, the far-right Alternative for Germany, or AfD, surged while the three parties that make up the countrys federal coali… [+4215 chars]
